data.message:
Hello friends like you, I support the cause , but I am from Brazil and here we do not have much education , the last case was the band of a friend who has been discriminated against for defending our beloved cause. we are running a space in ROCK IN RIO . But other homophobic and even racist bands are leading . I need your help to show that in the world there is no place for prejudice and discrimination VOTE IN BAND OF MY FRIEND AND HELPS PROMOTE OUR CAUSE NOT DELAY 10 SECONDS AND YOU WILL IS HELPING TO COMBAT THAT MONSTER IS WHAT DISCRIMINATION
ENOUGH JUST CLICK ON THE FACEBOOK
LINK : rockinrio.vw.com.br/minhabanda/meio-dia-pras-quatro
